subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Yao Ming fractured the bone under his right knee, and the Los Angeles Clippers took advantage of his absence to defeat the Houston Rockets, 98-93, last night and snap a six-game losing streak.
snippet: Yao Ming fractured the bone under his right knee, and the Los Angeles Clippers took advantage of his absence to defeat the Houston Rockets, 98-93, last night and snap a six-game losing streak.
